post.body: If I have to wait to click on "Publish" to drop the post, that should be fine. I get up at 0500 tomorrow anyway.
I should know that, shouldn't I? :p They are usually up and running pretty quickly. So no worries.
Count me in.
Thank you, sir.
Want a guy who loves to shop for tech stuff?
And I think that's the problem...hence the Internal SERVER error. *grump* Why tonight? Oh yeah I'm posting...
I would like to talk to you more in detail about how you're using Twitter. Best contact for you?
Yeah, this is DH. I want to edit a post, and I'll make it a few steps and then "FAIL"
i think its the DH server. It was working fine moments ago, and no didn't change a thing.
Tell me something -- are you officially affiliated with Comcast, or are you an associate working on your own? Please DM.
*LOL* Thank YO, sir. Much appreciated.
Panelists for...?
No, it was an old fashioned phone call and in 10 minutes I was back. (Hmm, maybe it's not Comcast tonight. That leaves DH.)
:p
New W&G?! Huzzah!
I don't have BackTraxx, and I think that's more of music beds. The SFX librbary I've been thrilled with.
*LOL* I could, for the right price add in an appearance by Gigi Edgely and Lucy Lawless for fun.... "Hello, sailor!!!"
And personally, i've found better quality stuff on Freesound.
OYE! You watch that crap!!! Or I swear I'll make Rafe have a "walk the plank" roleplay with Askana and Jennifer Connelly!
GarageBand's got a great collection, and yes, some affordable sets are out there.
Awww...rats.
1. Rafe's a MAN! Deal! 2. Dinosaurs. Bitch, what did I tell you about spoilers?! Bet you're going to mention the robots next!
No lie...and even with the contributors/Pro account, it's limited DLs. TEH SUK! You could buy the Digital Juice FX for less!
Did you need me to hop onto Skype and talk to you about it? (Seriously....)
Here you go. Link to the story. http://tinyurl.com/7tg7gl
I'm looking at Google and CNN....and there's nothing.
Oh :) Thanks.
*LoL* Thank you, sir!
Laters! :)
Depending on the stakes, you can work up a sweat at the blackjack tables. ;)
I think my hotel in Vegas has a gym. I'm planning on taking my workout clothes with me...
So long as you don't want to "toss my salad" with syrup or jelly, I'm good with the prison talk...
Maryland Renaissance Festival. http://www.rennfest.com/ Where Rafe and Serena Rafton came to be.
Me too...but I decided to chance it that people knew as I was travelling I referred to an airline. ;)
saw that...should have taken a pic of that!
not a long enough stay...my flight is boarding...
please feel free to send a VM at 7037911701 or send an MP3, feel free; and thanks for listening!
that was a killer post!
safe trip to you, sir! Arigato!
boarding my flight.... See you soon!
Damn, but Airplane is full of awesome!!!
DUDE, you're killing me...I'm about to leave town! :(
Happy birthday, you young'n!
I do...and don't call me Shirley. (Flight crew JUST got here.)
Thank you, my friend!
Okay, it's official....DH's server for TeeMorris.com/MOREVI.net is down. Hopefully, it'll be fixed in a few...or first thing tomorrow...
I cannot win. Not only is my DH server FAILING hard...wife decides to clean the floor above the studio. So... stepping away from the Mac.
Crew: If you do not get your MOREVI tonight, it's not my fault. I blame DH and Comcast together.
And just ad I say that from the iPhone my Internets works....I'm skeptical...
Hmmm....yes...something is stuffed either at DH or Comcast.
Woah...Soundsnap.com is no longer "free"...it's now five SFX for free, $29/month for unlimited use. Wow. That bites.
HOLY CRAP! I just noticed on http://www.rennfest.com/ they're thinking about MOVING Revel Grove! WOW!
I have arrived in Vegas....baby!
When next I tweet, I will be in Vegas. See you on the other side...
On the flight...it's going to be a full airbus this time around.
NWA does the free for all boarding. Bad form, NWA.
A very cool feature of Detroit's airport... http://twitpic.com/106gz
In Flight magazine featured an article on Social Media. Good article too. Am omen for #ces09?
In Detroit...first leg done...
Boarding...
